verses.verse: Open <WH6605> <WH8798> thy doors <WH1817>, O Lebanon <WH3844>, that the fire <WH784> may devour <WH398> <WH8799> thy cedars <WH730>.

Howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, fir tree <WH1265>; for the cedar <WH730> is fallen <WH5307> <WH8804>; because the mighty <WH117> are spoiled <WH7703> <WH8795>: howl <WH3213> <WH8685>, O ye oaks <WH437> of Bashan <WH1316>; for the forest <WH3293> of the vintage <WH1208> <WH8675> <WH1219> <WH8803> is come down <WH3381> <WH8804>.

There is a voice <WH6963> of the howling <WH3215> of the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>; for their glory <WH155> is spoiled <WH7703> <WH8795>: a voice <WH6963> of the roaring <WH7581> of young lions <WH3715>; for the pride <WH1347> of Yarden <WH3383> is spoiled <WH7703> <WH8795>.
Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>; Feed <WH7462> <WH8798> the flock <WH6629> of the slaughter <WH2028>;

Whose possessors <WH7069> <WH8802> slay <WH2026> <WH8799> them, and hold themselves not guilty <WH816> <WH8799>: and they that sell <WH4376> <WH8802> them say <WH559> <WH8799>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068>; for I am rich <WH6238> <WH8686>: and their own shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> pity <WH2550> <WH8799> them not.

For I will no more pity <WH2550> <WH8799> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>: but, lo, I will deliver <WH4672> <WH8688> the men <WH120> every one <WH376> into his neighbour's <WH7453> hand <WH3027>, and into the hand <WH3027> of his king <WH4428>: and they shall smite <WH3807> <WH8765> the land <WH776>, and out of their hand <WH3027> I will not deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> them.

And I will feed <WH7462> <WH8799> the flock <WH6629> of slaughter <WH2028>, even you <WH3651>, O poor <WH6041> of the flock <WH6629>. And I took <WH3947> <WH8799> unto me two <WH8147> staves <WH4731>; the one <WH259> I called <WH7121> <WH8804> Beauty <WH5278>, and the other <WH259> I called <WH7121> <WH8804> Bands <WH2254> <WH8802>; and I fed <WH7462> <WH8799> the flock <WH6629>.

Three <WH7969> shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> also I cut off <WH3582> <WH8686> in one <WH259> month <WH3391>; and my soul <WH5315> lothed <WH7114> <WH8799> them, and their soul <WH5315> also abhorred <WH973> <WH8804> me.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, I will not feed <WH7462> <WH8799> you: that that dieth <WH4191> <WH8801>, let it die <WH4191> <WH8799>; and that that is to be cut off <WH3582> <WH8737>, let it be cut off <WH3582> <WH8735>; and let the rest <WH7604> <WH8737> eat <WH398> <WH8799> every one <WH802> the flesh <WH1320> of another <WH7468>.

And I took <WH3947> <WH8799> my staff <WH4731>, even Beauty <WH5278>, and cut it asunder <WH1438> <WH8799>, that I might break <WH6565> <WH8687> my covenant <WH1285> which I had made <WH3772> <WH8804> with all the people <WH5971>.

And it was broken <WH6565> <WH8714> in that day <WH3117>: and so the poor <WH6041> of the flock <WH6629> that waited <WH8104> <WH8802> upon me knew <WH3045> <WH8799> that it was the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>.

And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, If ye think <WH5869> good <WH2896>, give <WH3051> <WH8798> me my price <WH7939>; and if not, forbear <WH2308> <WH8798>. So they weighed <WH8254> <WH8799> for my price <WH7939> thirty <WH7970> pieces of silver <WH3701>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Cast <WH7993> <WH8685> it unto the potter <WH3335> <WH8802>: a goodly <WH145> price <WH3366> that I was prised at <WH3365> <WH8804> of them. And I took <WH3947> <WH8799> the thirty <WH7970> pieces of silver <WH3701>, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> them to the potter <WH3335> <WH8802> in the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

Then I cut asunder <WH1438> <WH8799> mine other <WH8145> staff <WH4731>, even Bands <WH2254> <WH8802>, that I might break <WH6565> <WH8687> the brotherhood <WH264> between Y'hudah <WH3063> and Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> unto thee yet the instruments <WH3627> of a foolish <WH196> shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>.

For, lo, I will raise up <WH6965> <WH8688> a shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802> in the land <WH776>, which shall not visit <WH6485> <WH8799> those that be cut off <WH3582> <WH8737>, neither shall seek <WH1245> <WH8762> the young one <WH5289>, nor heal <WH7495> <WH8762> that that is broken <WH7665> <WH8737>, nor feed <WH3557> <WH8770> that that standeth <WH5324> <WH8737> still: but he shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> the flesh <WH1320> of the fat <WH1277>, and tear <WH6561> their cTorahs <WH6541> in pieces <WH6561> <WH8762>.

Woe <WH1945> to the idol <WH457> shepherd <WH7473> that leaveth <WH5800> <WH8802> the flock <WH6629> ! the sword <WH2719> shall be upon his arm <WH2220>, and upon his right <WH3225> eye <WH5869>: his arm <WH2220> shall be clean <WH3001> <WH8800> dried up <WH3001> <WH8799>, and his right <WH3225> eye <WH5869> shall be utterly <WH3543> <WH8800> darkened <WH3543> <WH8799>.
